path.description: The name of the DynamoDB table to crawl.

scanAll.description: Indicates whether to scan all the records, or to sample rows from the table. Scanning all the records can take a long time when the table is not a high throughput table.  defaults to `true`.

scanRate.description: The percentage of the configured read capacity units to use by the AWS Glue crawler. The valid values are null or a value between 0.1 to 1.5.
